Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Silver Scout acted like a rabid animal biting and slashing at the pod. Her =
systems worked slowly repairing the self inflicted wounds that her struggli=
ng had caused. In a desperate act she transformed to her hawk form and bega=
n beating her wings in a futile escape attempt. Until her repairs were comp=
lete she had little hope of thinking like a bot.
